description: Teodorin Obiang, the president's son, was found guilty of using public money for personal gain.
title: Teodorin Obiang: French court fines Equatorial Guinea VP
title_page: Teodorin Obiang: French court fines Equatorial Guinea VP - BBC News
maintext: The fate of the mansion is unclear, as Obiang's lawyers have filed an appeal with the International Court of Justice arguing that it should be offered the same protection as a diplomatic building, AFP reports.
